title: Best of The Herd: 04/15/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/15/2019
description:
Colin gives thanks to Tiger Woods for not only bringing us all together but also becoming part of our family by going through humbling experiences. Russell Wilson is trying to force Seattle’s hand into signing him to a long term deal. And, he says the Toronto Raptors lack the championship ingredients necessary to win while the Boston Celtics have all of them.  Plus a Monday edition of: "Where Colin was right and where Colin was wrong!"  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
